org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

Class BwProvisionerSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisioner
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisionerSimple

  • public class BwProvisionerSimple
extends BwProvisioner
    BwProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is bw available to request, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BwProvisionerSimple(long bw)
      Instantiates a new bw provisioner simple.
